sqlMap.select: select EXP_ID, PROJ_ID, BRANCH_ID, BATCH_NO, SEQ_NO, TABLE_NAME, FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, TABLE_FILTER, FILE_TITLE, FIELD_TITLE_FLAG, COMMENTS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, RSV4, RSV5 from DP_EXP_CFG where EXP_ID = #expId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into DP_EXP_CFG (EXP_ID, PROJ_ID, BRANCH_ID, BATCH_NO, SEQ_NO, TABLE_NAME, FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, TABLE_FILTER, FILE_TITLE, FIELD_TITLE_FLAG, COMMENTS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, RSV4, RSV5) values (#expId:VARCHAR#, #projId:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #batchNo:DECIMAL#, #seqNo:DECIMAL#, #tableName:VARCHAR#, #fileId:VARCHAR#, #fileName:VARCHAR#, #filePath:VARCHAR#, #tableFilter:VARCHAR#, #fileTitle:VARCHAR#, #fieldTitleFlag:VARCHAR#, #comments:VARCHAR#, #createTime:CHAR#, #createUser:VARCHAR#, #updateTime:CHAR#, #updateUser:VARCHAR#, #rsv1:VARCHAR#, #rsv2:VARCHAR#, #rsv3:VARCHAR#, #rsv4:VARCHAR#, #rsv5:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update DP_EXP_CFG set PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#, BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#, SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#, TABLE_NAME = #tableName:VARCHAR#, FILE_ID = #fileId:VARCHAR#, FILE_NAME = #fileName:VARCHAR#, FILE_PATH = #filePath:VARCHAR#, TABLE_FILTER = #tableFilter:VARCHAR#, FILE_TITLE = #fileTitle:VARCHAR#, FIELD_TITLE_FLAG = #fieldTitleFlag:VARCHAR#, COMMENTS = #comments:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#, CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#, UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime:CHAR#, UPDATE_USER = #updateUser:VARCHAR#, RSV1 = #rsv1:VARCHAR#, RSV2 = #rsv2:VARCHAR#, RSV3 = #rsv3:VARCHAR#, RSV4 = #rsv4:VARCHAR#, RSV5 = #rsv5:VARCHAR# where EXP_ID = #expId:VARCHAR#

update DP_EXP_CFG
PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#
BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#
SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#
TABLE_NAME = #tableName:VARCHAR#
FILE_ID = #fileId:VARCHAR#
FILE_NAME = #fileName:VARCHAR#
FILE_PATH = #filePath:VARCHAR#
TABLE_FILTER = #tableFilter:VARCHAR#
FILE_TITLE = #fileTitle:VARCHAR#
FIELD_TITLE_FLAG = #fieldTitleFlag:VARCHAR#
COMMENTS = #comments:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#
CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#
UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime:CHAR#
UPDATE_USER = #updateUser:VARCHAR#
where EXP_ID = #expId:VARCHAR# and UPDATE_USER = #rsv1:VARCHAR# and UPDATE_TIME = #rsv2:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from DP_EXP_CFG where 1=1
and BRANCH_ID like '%$branchId$%'
and TABLE_NAME like '%$tableName$%'
and FILE_NAME like '%$fileName$%'
order by PROJ_ID,BRANCH_ID ,BATCH_NO,SEQ_NO

select * from DP_EXP_CFG where 1=1
and BRANCH_ID like '%$branchId$%'
and TABLE_NAME like '%$tableName$%'
and FILE_NAME like '%$fileName$%'
and COMMENTS like '%$comments$%'

select count(*) from DP_EXP_CFG where 1=1
and EXP_ID <> #expId:VARCHAR#
and PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#
and BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
and BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#
and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#

select count(*) from DP_EXP_CFG where 1=1
and EXP_ID <> #expId:VARCHAR#
and PROJ_ID = #projId:VARCHAR#
and BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
and BATCH_NO = #batchNo:DECIMAL#
and TABLE_NAME = #tableName:VARCHAR#
and FILE_ID = #fileId:VARCHAR#
